## Slides

<!-- -   [Talk 1 Title](https://rich-ramsey.github.io/talks_example/talk1/) - Conference Name, Date -->

<!-- -   [Talk 2 Title](https://rich-ramsey.github.io/talks_example/talk2/) - Conference Name, Date -->

```{r}
#| label: schedule-table
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

# Create the basic data
raw_data <- tribble(
  ~Title, ~Link, ~Meeting, ~Date,
  "Talk 1", "https://rich-ramsey.github.io/talks_example/talk1/", 
  "??", "??",
  "Talk 2", "https://rich-ramsey.github.io/talks_example/talk2/", 
  "??", "??",
)

# Transform to create proper links
talks <- raw_data  |> 
  mutate(Title = cell_spec(
    Title,
    "html", 
    link = Link
  ))  |> 
  select(Title, Meeting, Date)

# Simplified table rendering
talks |> 
  kbl(escape = FALSE) |> 
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"),  # Embrace the striping
    full_width = TRUE,
    position = "center"
  ) |> 
  column_spec(1:2, width = "5em") |>
  column_spec(3, width = "20em") 
```
